name: Fruits Crush: Mach3 Puzzle
description:
Fruit puzzles with limitless hearts!
Fresh boss, friendly fruits
Delicious, fragrant fruits from just playing
Fruit popping ASMR!
JMT fruits bursting with juice! Download now!

■■■■■Game Intro■■■■■
Endless puzzles of sweet fruits
Popular developer DAERISOFT's new connecting puzzle game!

Warning: playing at night may lead to successful dieting

In a sweet world made of the fruits we all love,
enjoy this new, match 3 puzzle game!

Home page
https://www.facebook.com/daerisoft

https://twitter.com/daerisoft

■■■■■ Game Features ■■■■■
■ Connect 3 or more sweet fruits.
The more fruits you connect, the higher your score.

■ 2000 huge and diverse stages
Full of JMT fruits to eat.

■ Rank mode for competing with friends around the world
Achieve the highest score during a given Move.
Compete for ranking with other users!

■ Challenging missions and obstacles!
A variety of novel devices and missions await your challenge.

■ Addictive gameplay
An addictive puzzle game where hours can pass like seconds

■ Stress-free puzzle fun
With no time limit, just connect three or more fruits in these
simple and relaxing puzzles, but also enjoy the need for high-level strategy.

■ Best for brain training with simple rules!
Train your brain with simple, uncomplicated rules.

■ Supports achievements and leaderboards through Gamecenter
Compete with other users!
